meta.title: Okamoto Foods Co., Ltd. | Unlock the Power of Fruit
meta.description: Founded in 1921. With over a century of expertise and dedication, we deliver safe and reliable foods made with carefully selected domestic ingredients.

hero.title: Unlock the Power of Fruit
hero.subtitle: Founded in 1921. With over a century of expertise, we deliver safe, reliable foods made with carefully selected domestic ingredients.

company.heading: About Us
company.subtitle: History and Philosophy of Okamoto Foods
company.body: Since our founding in 1921, we have delivered safe and reliable foods using carefully selected domestic ingredients, built on over a century of expertise and dedication.
company.mission: We provide safe, reliable, and delicious food to everyone, contributing to a healthy and happy society

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We deliver safe and reliable food products through our commitment to domestic ingredients and strict quality control.

trust.title: Trusted Relationships
trust.description: Through long-standing relationships with our producers, we secure the highest quality ingredients.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We operate sustainably with environmental consideration, fulfilling our responsibility to future generations.

greeting.title: Message from Management
greeting.name: Yoshihisa Okamoto
greeting.content1: Our company was founded in May 1921 as a tomato sauce processor. For over 100 years, we have continued to create products with a commitment to domestic ingredients.
greeting.content2: Based on our belief that 'good products can only be made from good ingredients,' we value our relationships with producers.
greeting.content3: We sincerely appreciate your continued support and patronage as we move forward.

products.title: OK BRAND Main Products
products.subtitle: We deliver safe and reliable food products centered on domestic agricultural produce

mikan.title: Mikan (Mandarin Orange)
mikan.description: Fresh mandarins harvested at peak season are carefully processed by removing peels, seeds, and membranes, then preserved segment by segment in light syrup. Enjoy the enhanced fruit flavor in every bite.

domesticCan.name: Domestic Mikan #1 Can (L/M) (Light Syrup)
domesticCan.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic mikan canned product

pouche1kg.name: Mikan 1kg Pouch
pouche1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved Chinese mikan pouch type

domesticPouch1kg.name: Domestic Mikan 1kg Pouch
domesticPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic mikan pouch type

chineseCan.name: Chinese Mikan #1 Can
chineseCan.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved Chinese mikan canned product

peach.title: Yellow Peach
peach.description: Domestic yellow peaches and premium Greek yellow peaches are processed by removing pits and peels, then conveniently diced. Preserved in light syrup to enjoy the natural deliciousness of the fruit flesh.

domesticCanDiced.name: Domestic Yellow Peach Diced #1 Can
domesticCanDiced.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic yellow peach diced cut canned product

domesticPouch1kg.name: Domestic Yellow Peach Diced 1kg Pouch
domesticPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic yellow peach diced cut pouch type

greekPouch1kg.name: Yellow Peach Diced 1kg Pouch
greekPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved Greek yellow peach diced cut pouch type

tomato.title: Tomato
tomato.description: Domestic tomatoes harvested at peak season are processed by removing cores and peeling, then preserved in squeezed tomato juice. No water is added during manufacturing, capturing the fresh flavor of domestic tomatoes. Available in diced cuts as well as rare whole types.

domesticWhole.name: Domestic Tomato Whole #1 Can
domesticWhole.description: Rare whole type for domestic tomatoes

mushroom.title: Mushroom
mushroom.description: Crisp and flavorful mushrooms are thinly sliced. We offer domestic varieties processed immediately after harvest, as well as mushrooms from major production areas in Europe and China. *Large volume frozen types (whole/sliced) are also available.

domesticSlicedPouch.name: Domestic Mushroom Sliced 1kg Pouch
domesticSlicedPouch.description: Easy-to-use sliced domestic mushroom pouch type

chineseSlicedCan.name: Mushroom Sliced #1 Can
chineseSlicedCan.description: Easy-to-use sliced Chinese mushroom canned product

europeanSlicedPouch.name: Mushroom Sliced (European Ingredients) 1kg Pouch
europeanSlicedPouch.description: Easy-to-use sliced Dutch mushroom pouch type

chineseSlicedPouch.name: Mushroom Sliced 1kg Pouch
chineseSlicedPouch.description: Easy-to-use sliced Chinese mushroom pouch type

pineapple.title: Pineapple
pineapple.description: Sweet and aromatic Thai pineapples are cut into bite-sized pieces. Preserved in light syrup to enjoy the natural deliciousness of the fruit flesh.

tidbitsPouch1kg.name: Pineapple Tidbits 1kg Pouch
tidbitsPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved Thai pineapple bite-sized cut pouch type

mixedFruits.title: Mixed Fruits
mixedFruits.description: Mixed bite-sized pineapple (Thai), yellow peach (Greek), and mikan (domestic). Eliminates the need to prepare multiple fruits separately.

mixedPouch1kg.name: Mixed Fruits 1kg Pouch
mixedPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved pineapple, yellow peach, and mikan mixed bite-sized cut pouch type

mikanPulp.title: Others (Mikan Pulp)
mikanPulp.description: Domestic 'granular mikan' pulp. Syrup-preserved pulp used as ingredients for beverages, yogurt, jelly, and other products.

domesticPulpCan.name: Domestic Mikan Pulp #5 Can
domesticPulpCan.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic mikan granular mikan canned product

frozen.title: Frozen Fruits
frozen.description: Frozen fruits featuring 'domestic fruits,' 'peeled,' and 'syrup-preserved' quality. We handle everything from fresh fruit procurement (direct from production areas) and primary processing to final products consistently. Domestic fruits are peeled, syrup-preserved, and individually frozen piece by piece.

frozenMikan1kg.name: OK Frozen Fruits Domestic Mikan 1kg
frozenMikan1kg.description: Syrup-preserved domestic mikan individually frozen for easy use

chillMikan110g.name: Chill Mikan 110g
chillMikan110g.description: Syrup-preserved domestic mikan individually frozen for easy use

frozenPeach1kg.name: OK Frozen Fruits Domestic Yellow Peach 1kg
frozenPeach1kg.description: Syrup-preserved domestic yellow peach individually frozen for easy use

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed with our latest news and announcements

content.intro: Okamoto Foods Co., Ltd. obtained JFS-B Standard compliance certification operated by the Japan Food Safety Management Association (JFSM) in March 2024.

section1.title: About JFS-B Standards
section1.content: The JFS-B standard is an internationally harmonized food safety management standard originating from Japan, consisting of three requirement layers: Food Safety Management System (FSM), Hazard Control (HACCP), and Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP).

section2.title: Our Future Commitment
section2.content: We will continue to maintain this system and strive to further strengthen our quality control system so that we can continue to deliver safe and secure products to our customers.

footer.description: We deliver safety, deliciousness, and smiles. With over a century of expertise and dedication, we provide safe and reliable foods made with carefully selected domestic ingredients.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Okamoto Foods Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.

features.title: Commitment to Domestic Ingredients
features.subtitle: We implement contract cultivation and other initiatives to deliver safe, reliable, and delicious products.
features.qualityTitle: Good products can only be made from good ingredients
features.qualityDescription: Having produced agricultural canned goods for many years, we understand this principle better than anyone.
features.rawMaterialsDescription: Our domestic ingredient products include mandarins, tomatoes, peaches, and more. Rather than simply buying and selling ingredients, our product development begins by working closely with producers to build trust relationships and determine how to consistently create high-quality ingredients.
features.procurementCapabilityDescription: We have strong connections with production areas and markets based on years of experience and trust, providing us with powerful procurement capabilities for various domestic agricultural ingredients.
features.procurementCapabilitySecond: Through advanced initiatives such as cultivation contracts for specific seed varieties with producers and our own mandarin cultivation, we have established a system for stable medium- to long-term ingredient procurement.
features.cultivationSubtitle: In-house mandarin cultivation (Group joint project farm) started in 2021
features.cultivationDescription: In collaboration with our group company Toas Co., Ltd., we began planting mandarin seedlings in March 2021.
features.projectPurpose1: • Stable procurement of ingredients with suitable processing varieties
features.projectPurpose2: • Local production for local consumption and food education initiatives
features.seasonPackDescription: Various carefully cultivated domestic agricultural ingredients are processed while maintaining their fresh state.
features.processingCapabilityDescription: We have proprietary equipment and production lines for each product category, establishing a system for stable production of domestic agricultural processed products.
features.foodSafetyDescription: To deliver products of 'reliable quality' and 'safety and security' to our customers, we maintain high awareness of product quality, focusing on ingredients and quality in our product development.
features.foodSafetySecond: We also listen to customer feedback, making 'safety and security' our top priority and quickly implementing improvements throughout the company to enhance quality.
features.qualityManagementDescription: We have extensive technical expertise and manufacturing experience in agricultural processing. Beyond safety and nutritional components, we establish the safety of all products through strict quality testing and thorough quality management to ensure stable product quality and deliver safe, reliable products.
features.qualityManagementSecond: In product manufacturing, we check hygiene management conditions and verify that each manufacturing process is implemented according to specified procedures. We also conduct various tests including sensory, physicochemical, and microbiological testing, establishing a system where only products meeting specifications are shipped.

foodTable.subtitle2: Our fruits serve as a bridge that connects smiles.

foodTable.description2: Each product, filled with our dedication, adds color to everyday life.
